page.title: 06EVENTS
page.content: Braceby has a unique community spirit an annual New Year's Party is held in one of the houses when all the village attend. During the year a church fund raising event is held, e.g.in the past five years we've had{Dutch Auction, {Barbecue, Halloween Party, Musical {Recital, Cheese & Wine Party.}The largest event was in l982 when a {Village Festival}was held attracting over 1,000 visitors who saw 20 rural crafts, painting exhibition, flower festival, farm nature trail, all domestic gardens open, talks on history of Braceby. This event was featured on{local radio & TV.}For this event we were awarded second place in Lincs Community Council Village Ventures competition. Christmas l984 saw the{lst wedding in Br. for 20 yrs. Many village houses are used for fund raising events for charities.
